description: Standing agreement for construction, maintenance and demolition services at Sarnia Upper Navy yard
full_summary:
# WCS (contract identifier) for RISO Construction Services
### WCS Publications and Expiration Dates
| WCS Identifier | Publication Date | Closing Date | Posting URL |
| --- | --- | --- | --- |
| WS3851992592 | March 16, 2023 | April 12, 2023, 2:00 PM ET | [Link](http://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/15721323?extsite=MTU3MjEzMjNfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==) |

### Contract Facilities and Locations
| Facility | Location |
| --- | --- |
| 14 Wing Greenwood | Nova Scotia, Canada |
| CFS Camp Aldershot | Nova Scotia, Canada |

### Tender Category and Status
The procurement falls under the contract category of Major Works (SRV) and is categorized as Standing Offer. This standing offer is now **Expired**.

### Contract Objectives and Scope
Canada is seeking offers for a Standing Offer contract to provide a range of minor construction and maintenance services at the specified facilities. These services will be delivered in accordance with the specifications outlined in the contract documents.

### UNSPSC Codes
This Standing Offer has a UNSPSC code of:

* 72101500, Building maintenance and repair services
* 72101501, Handyman services
* 72101507, Building maintenance service
* 72102900, Facility maintenance and repair services
* 72103300, Infrastructure maintenance and repair services
* 72120000, Non-residential building construction services
* 72141510, Demolition services
* 72152300, Carpentry services
* 76111500, General building and office cleaning and maintenance services

### Key Dates and Locations
* Amendments: Last amendment was made on March 16, 2023
* Closing Date: April 12, 2023, 2:00 PM ET
* Locations: 14 Wing Greenwood and CFS Camp Aldershot, both in Nova Scotia, Canada
